org.apache.fineract.portfolio.loanaccount.domain

Class LoanSummary

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fineract.portfolio.loanaccount.domain.LoanSummary

  • @Embeddable
public final class LoanSummary
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates all the summary details of a Loan. LoanSummary fields are updated through a scheduled job. see - UpdateLoanSummariesScheduledJob.
